gen:link.msg:message: `FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRates` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRates')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_FinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRates return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesBreakdownHealthCare_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfFinancingDeficitSurplusToBeSettledInRatesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
